Topic Summary: This determination relates to an appeal against assessments in accordance with section 31 and / or section 31A Stamp Duties Consolidation Act 1999 (‘SDCA 1999’).
Tax Legislation: Section 31, 31a Stamp Duties Consolidation Act 1999 (SDCS1999) Supreme Court of Judicature Act (Ireland) 1877, Uk Judicature Act 1873, UK Judicature Act 1925
